name: Ms. Cthulhu
description:
Ms. Cthulhu is an endless runner developed for the 2014 Monster Mash game jam. When Ms. Cthulhu was woken from her slumber in R'lyeh by cute boys, she just has to chase them! ^_^

This version has Cthulhu chase an antarctic explorer, who might fall off, and not come back, oops! Controls are very simple, space to jump, hold to jump higher, but make sure to click on the game first!
